channel.title: GitHub Trending - PHP (Weekly)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in PHP nel periodo weekly

item.title: 🐘 Taujor/php-static-site-generator (35 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: Taujor

📝 Repository: Taujor/php-static-site-generator
